doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Alauddin
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), MCPS, FCPS (Pediatrics), FCPS (Pediatric Neurology)
doctor.specialty: Child Neurological Disorders, Development & Autism Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Alauddin is a highly qualified Child Neurology, Development, and Autism Specialist with credentials including MBBS, BCS (Health), MCPS, FCPS (Child), and FCPS (Child Neurology). He serves as an Assistant Professor of Pediatric Neurology at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. Dr. Alauddin specializes in diagnosing and treating neurological disorders in children, including epilepsy, cerebral palsy, autism spectrum disorder (ASD), developmental delays, and pediatric movement disorders. He consults at Parkview Hospital, Chattogram, located at 94/103, Katalganj Road, Panchlaish. His visiting hours are from 6 PM to 8 PM (closed on Thursdays and Fridays).r‚Äù].
